name: Song Trash Can
description: Improved level songs & SFX trash button.

auto-select-songs.name: Auto Select Songs
auto-select-songs.description: Automatically selects the <cl>songs</c> option in the delete popup on levels with <cl>SFX</c> or multiple <cl>songs</c>.

auto-select-sfx.name: Auto Select SFX
auto-select-sfx.description: Automatically selects the <cl>SFX</c> option in the delete popup on levels with <cl>SFX</c> or multiple <cl>songs</c>.

hide-settings-button.name: Hide Settings Button
hide-settings-button.description: Hides the <cy>settings</c> button from the delete popups
